properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 8 at 5:32PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
Snow showers, heavy at times, will continue to move across
Beaverhead and Madison Counties this evening. The passage of a
strong cold front will also cause northerly winds to gust in
excess of 30 mph during this time. The combination of snow and
gusty winds will cause periods of visibility less than one mile.

If you are traveling around this area this evening, be aware that
roads can become snow-covered or obscured quickly. Slow down, and
give yourself plenty of time to react to changing conditions.

NWSheadline: Periods of snow showers and gusty north winds to reduce visibility this evening
